title: TFT: Overtime and Points Lose
body:
I build a tanky team, got the timer to overtime, lose on the first three hits and go from 21 to zero points and lose.

I like the idea of the overtime, but how come you lose more points when you are in overtime than in the normal game? Like I understand someone has to lose but if it is in overtime the point lose should be minimal. 
Maybe kick overtime earlier instead of waiting for the timer to end so if you lose in normal time you still lose more points that if you lose in overtime.

It just sucks the way it is now....
